title: Death toll from China floods jumps to 302, as Covid outbreak complicates recovery
content:
1. Death toll from China floods jumps to 302, as Covid outbreak complicates recovery  CNN
  2. Death toll triples to more than 300 in recent China flooding  Yahoo News
  3. Death Toll in China Floods Surges Past 300  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  4. Public needs an answer for Zhengzhou floods high death toll: Global Times editorial  Global Times
  5. China flood death toll rises sharply to over 300  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 中国の洪水による死者数が302名に増加、コヴィドの発生で復旧が困難に
中国洪灾死亡人数猛增至302人，柯维德疫情使灾后重建工作复杂化
中國洪災死亡人數猛增至302人，柯維德疫情使災後重建工作複雜化
